channel.title: Custom Programs Selection
channel.description: I am wondering about all the applications I use in Xubuntu. Is the Whonix method suggestive of using the Whonix workstaton to host all those apps instead of the host OS? What if I keep using the host environment?

item.title: Custom Programs Selection
item.dc:creator: randy
item.description:
Thank you. I am beginning to understand, and I see your point about this issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Programs Selection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
randy:

Is the Whonix method suggestive of using the Whonix workstaton to host all those apps instead of the host OS?

Up to you. The ultimate way by Qubes(-Whonix) is to compartmentalize even more, doing everything inside VMs.

See also:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/DoNot#Do_not_use_clearnet_and_Tor_at_the_same_time.

Read full topic
